Summary Note:
The RM first met Friis Østergaard Krog at a wine tasting event in Copenhagen. They discovered a shared passion for fine wines and decided to explore potential business ventures together.
Friis Østergaard Krog is a 41 year old and comes from Denmark.
Seeking a trusted partner for wealth management, he joined Julius Baer for its comprehensive and tailored services.
Family Background: Friis Østergaard Krog and Katrine tied the knot in 2009. They do not have any children.
Education Background:
Friis received his secondary school diploma from Aabenraa Gymnasium in 2002.
Friis earned his degree from Copenhagen Business School in 2006.
Friis earned his additionally degree from University College Lillebælt in 2011.
Occupation History:
Friis Østergaard Krog is a 41 year old and comes from Denmark.
Friis Østergaard Krog's first role was as a Associate Attorney at Bech-Bruun, where he worked diligently from 2008 to 2012 to establish a strong reputation.
At Bech-Bruun, he held the position of Senior Associate from 2014 to 2019, making significant contributions to the organization.
From 2020 till now, he served as a Partner at Gorrissen Federspiel, solidifying his position as a leader in the industry.
Wealth Summary:
He managed to save approximately 1090000 DKK from his earnings at all companies.
He has invested in several rental properties across various locations, generating additional income. The properties are valued at 5650000 DKK.


In addition to his career success, he also received an inheritance of 25840000 DKK from his late grandmother, a renowned Corporate Lawyer, in 2013.
Client Summary: In light of the above, we are optimistic about the client's financial future and career progression and are eager to welcome him as a new client.
